nodes.name: InitializerAuRa
InitializerAuRa

devdoc.details: Used once on network startup and then destroyed. Needed for initializing upgradeable contracts since upgradeable contracts can't have constructors.

params._candidateMinStake: The minimum allowed amount of candidate stake in Wei (see the `StakingAuRa` contract).
params._collectRoundLength: The length of a collection round in blocks (see the `RandomAuRa` contract).
params._contracts: An array of the contracts:   0 is ValidatorSetAuRa,   1 is BlockRewardAuRa,   2 is RandomAuRa,   3 is StakingAuRa,   4 is TxPermission,   5 is Certifier.
params._delegatorMinStake: The minimum allowed amount of delegator stake in Wei (see the `StakingAuRa` contract).
params._firstValidatorIsUnremovable: The boolean flag defining whether the first validator in the `_miningAddresses/_stakingAddresses` array is non-removable. Should be `false` for production network.
params._miningAddresses: The array of initial validators' mining addresses.
params._stakeWithdrawDisallowPeriod: The duration period (in blocks) at the end of a staking epoch during which participants cannot stake or withdraw their staking tokens (e.g., 4320 = 6 hours for 5-seconds blocks in AuRa).
params._stakingAddresses: The array of initial validators' staking addresses.
params._stakingEpochDuration: The duration of a staking epoch in blocks (e.g., 120954 = 1 week for 5-seconds blocks in AuRa).
params._stakingEpochStartBlock: The number of the first block of initial staking epoch (must be zero if the network is starting from genesis block).
